title: Rob Pennington from By The Grace of God, Endpoint & more
itunes:title: Rob Pennington from By The Grace of God, Endpoint & more
description:
What a pod! Today we have Rob Pennington from Louisville hardcore legends, Endpoint and By The Grace of God. We discuss Louisville hardcore, viewing bands as a living and his life as a teacher. It was a very insightful chat and one I am glad to share with you! 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
